name: Recovery
description: Unlocks the ability for Azure Burst to still her mind and body to recover power.

name: Burst Dash
description: Unlocks the ability for Azure Burst to quickly dash forwards and backwards, avoiding damage.

name: Rapid Fire
description: Increase the fire rate of Azure Burst's basic attack by 50%.

name: Efficient Fireball
description: Decrease the power cost Azure Burst's fireballs by 40%.

name: Efficient Beam
description: Decrease the power cost of Azure Burst's beam by 50%.

name: Improved Meditation
description: Decrease the power cost of Recovery by 40%. Requires Recovery

name: Ultimate Meditation
description: Decrease the power cost of Recovery by an additional 20%. Requires Recovery and Improved Meditation.

name: Cardio
description: Decreases the power cost of Burst Dash by 60%. Requires Burst Dash.

name: Azure Rush
description: Increase Azure Burst's base movement speed by 33%.

name: Azure Blitz
description: Increase Azure Burst's base movement speed by an additional 33%. Requires Azure Rush.

name: Doomsday Preparation
description: Double Azure Burst's starting power again. Requires Overcharge and Preparation.

name: Mind's Eye
description: Doubles the speed of Recovery. Requires Recovery.

name: Burst Warp
description: Increases the duration of Burst Dash by 60%. Requires Burst Dash.
